Branding

We've established several simple branding standards for ourselves and others to use in situations relevant to our team.

Colors

Red

#d12727

Black

#333333

White

#ffffff
Font

ADAM.CG PRO

For headers and other prominent text, we use ADAM.CG PRO. The original font downloadable from most other locations has some rendering flaws in some browsers, so we've made a patched version available here.

Roboto Light

For body text on our website and elsewhere, we use Roboto Light.

Logo

We use this logo. We frequently modify the logo to fit the circumstances and only want modifications in the context of trying to conform to game theme.
